overview: Responsible for product management and product operations. Mr. Henkin brings more than 10 years of experience in web-based products ranging from e-commerce to online advertising and content. Prior to co-founding Kontera, Mr. Henkin served as a technical lead on several large scale e-commerce applications at iXL, Inc. a leading interactive consulting firm. Mr. Henkin graduated from San Francisco State University with a BS in Computer Information Systems (Magna Cum Laude) and holds an MBA from the Joint Executive MBA Program at Kellogg, Northwestern University and Recanati, Tel Aviv University.
